New Zealand director, actor and musician '''Harry Sinclair''' played [[Isildur]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King|The Return of the King]]''. He is a friend of [[Peter Jackson]], and was offered the role because he was the most corrupt-looking person Jackson knew. He had only one line, but because he did not sound as corrupt, it was dubbed by [[Hugo Weaving]]. 

==Quotes==
{{quote|It was great. I did some huge battle scenes, like 700 people on a mountainside. And the New Zealand Army were some of the extras. They'd yell 'CUT!' but some of these guys just kept hackin' away at each other.|Harry Sinclair, [http://movies.ign.com/articles/034/034286p1.html IGN Interview].}}
